We walk there frequently with our dog (on leash of course). It's a great walking beach and also great for youngsters who like to dig in the sand.

We visited during a cool spring day. We strolled the beach. The beach was clean. The waves were big. It was nice to watch the waves. Be careful a lot of traffic on the beach.
